channel.title: Home on Matilda L. Bradford Christian School, Inc.
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Matilda L. Bradford Christian School, Inc.

item.title: Other Cores Mottos 1
item.description: If I was to see you tomorrow Would be your last day on earth Would it fill your heart with fear and sorrow Or would you look at it as a rebirth? There was a boy once hidden in the shadows Who locked himself far, far away from the world Afraid to share the mana in his marrow Afraid to let his Black wings unfurl But, I won’t be a victim Of this society I will play Jah music Ina Babylon I won’t give my energy to Fear and anxiety These are my roots, this is my song

item.title: Other Cores Mottos 2
item.description: First Item Second Item Third Item Forth Item Fifth Item

item.title: Other Cores Mottos 3
item.description: First Item Second Item Third Item Forth Item Fifth Item

item.title: Core Value 1
item.description: Imagine Dragon - Bones Gimme, gimme, gimme some time to think I’m in the bathroom, looking at me Face in the mirror is all I need (ooh) Wait until the reaper takes my life Never gonna get me out alive I will live a thousand million lives (ooh) My patience is waning Is this entertaining? Our patience is waning Is this entertaining? I-I-I got this feeling, yeah, you know Where I’m losing all control ‘Cause there’s magic in my bones I-I-I got this feeling in my soul Go ahead and throw your stones ‘Cause there’s magic in my bones

item.title: Core Value 2
item.description: Oh, hush, my dear, it’s been a difficult year And terrors don’t prey on Innocent victims Trust me, darling, trust me, darling It’s been a loveless year I’m a man of three fears Integrity, faith and Crocodile tears Trust me, darling, trust me, darling So look me in the eyes Tell me what you see Perfect paradise Tearing at the seams I wish I could escape I don’t wanna fake it Wish I could erase it Make your heart believe

item.title: Core Value 3
item.description: Just a young gun with a quick fuse I was uptight, wanna let loose I was dreaming of bigger things And wanna leave my old life behind Not a yes-sir, not a follower Fit the box, fit the mold Have a seat in the foyer, take a number I was lightning before the thunder Thunder, thunder Thunder, thun-, thunder Thun-thun-thunder, thunder, thunder Thunder, thun-, thunder Thun-thun-thunder, thunder Thunder, feel the thunder Lightning then the thunder Thunder, feel the thunder Lightning then the thunder Thunder, thunder Thunder

item.title: Core Value 4
item.description: I used to rule the world Seas would rise when I gave the word Now in the morning, I sleep alone Sweep the streets I used to own I used to roll the dice Feel the fear in my enemy’s eyes Listen as the crowd would sing Now the old king is dead, long live the king One minute, I held the key Next the walls were closed on me And I discovered that my castles stand Upon pillars of salt and pillars of sand

item.title: Core Value 5
item.description: Look at the stars Look how they shine for you And everything you do Yeah, they were all yellow I came along I wrote a song for you And all the things you do And it was called Yellow So then I took my turn Oh, what a thing to have done And it was all yellow Your skin, oh yeah, your skin and bones Turn into something beautiful And you know, you know I love you so You know I love you so

item.title: Core Value 6
item.description: 25 years and my life is still Tryin’ to get up that great big hill of hope For a destination I realized quickly when I knew I should That the world was made up of this brotherhood of man For whatever that means And so I cry sometimes when I’m lying in bed Just to get it all out what’s in my head And I, I am feeling a little peculiar And so I wake in the morning and I step outside And I take a deep breath and I get real high And I scream from the top of my lungs “What’s going on?

item.title: Core Value 7
item.description: I know they don’t like me that much Guess that I don’t dress how they want I just wanna be myself, I can’t be someone else Try to colour inside their lines Try to live a life by design I just wanna be myself, I can’t be someone else Someone else They yell, they preach I’ve heard it all before Be this, be that I’ve heard it before Heard it before

item.title: Whats Make a MLBCSI
item.description: Carry on, my wayward son there’ll be peace when you are done lay your weary head to rest don’t you cry no more Once I rose above the noise and confusion just to get a glimpse beyond this illusion I was soaring ever higher but I flew too high though my eyes could see, I still was a blind man though my mind could think, I still was a mad man I hear the voices when i’m dreaming I can hear them say

item.title: Empowering Tomorrow: The Evolution of Education in a Changing World
item.description: Education, once confined to classrooms, is undergoing a profound transformation. Embracing technological advancements, personalized learning, and essential skill development, it’s evolving beyond boundaries. Remote learning, personalized curricula, and emphasis on crucial skills like critical thinking mark this shift. Collaborative learning and educators as mentors shape a future-ready education system. This evolution aims to empower individuals, fostering adaptability and innovation for success in an interconnected world.
